Ingredients.1: 2 large cucumbers, peeled and halved lengthwise

Ingredients.6: 3 tablespoons olive oil, or more to taste

Ingredients.9: 0.5 teaspoon lemon juice, or more to taste

Directions.1: Scrape cucumber seeds into a fine mesh sieve and press out as much liquid as possible. Reserve liquid and roughly chop cucumbers.

Directions.2: Combine cucumbers and cucumber liquid in the bowl of a food processor; process until smooth.

Directions.3: Whisk cucumber puree and sour cream together in a bowl. Season with sugar and cayenne. Cover and refrigerate.

Directions.4: Mash together mint, olive oil, and hazelnuts in a mortar and pestle until a paste forms. Season with salt and lemon juice.

Directions.5: Divide gazpacho between individual bowls and place a spoonful of mint paste on top of each.
